revision.text: Graph theory is the study of [[graph]]s, which are mathematical structures used to model pairwise relations between objects. It has applications in [[Computer science]] and [[Mathematics]]. See also [[Category:Graph theory]].

Computer science is an academic field and professional practice that studies algorithms and computational systems. It relates to [[Mathematics]] and [[Graph theory]]. See also [[Category:Computer science]].
Mathematics includes the study of such topics as quantity, structure, space, and change. Related fields include [[Computer science]] and [[Graph theory]]. See also [[Category:Mathematics]].

A social network is a social structure made up of individuals connected by relationships. This concept is studied using [[Graph theory]] and [[Computer science]]. See also [[Category:Social networks]].
This category contains articles related to graph theory.
This category contains articles related to computer science.
This category contains articles related to mathematics.
This category contains articles related to social networks.
